column4: BRIEF-Webster Financial Corporation Increases Common Dividend To $0.33
column6: * DECLARED A QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.33 PER SHARE ON ITS COMMON STOCK, AN INCREASE OF $0.07 FROM PREVIOUS $0.26 PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
